question: How can I lose weights when I have headaches by eating less?
question_content: I am so wanted to lose weights. I try eating portions each meal and I have headaches. How can I lose weights? Why do I have these headaches? Can anyone help me? Thank you.

don't call it a diet - call it a healthier way of eating and living word diet means restriction which means u don't get satisfied bc u think of what you can't have, instead of what you can have. eat what u want, in moderation. cut back on fatty things and if u crave something, have only a little, that way you are satisfied and still healthy. i'm a plus size woman, been trying to lose weight forever. what helped me? i wanted a burger and fries, so i shared half my fries and half by burger with my sis. healthy? not quite. did it fill me? somewhat. but slowly i cut back and cut back. ... now if im hungry i eat fruit and veggies, turns out they're good. =D slowly and surely the weight is coming off. am i on a diet? nope - just eating healthier.

Just exercise!! 
Diets hardly ever work because before your body starts using the excess fat you have stored up, it uses the glucose in your liver and any other emergency energy supply. Diets are NOT healthy because they cause your body to miss out on nutrients that are vital to keep your bones, muscles, and heart healthy. A much healthier alternative is exercising. Try jogging in the morning or working out with dumbbells for thirty minutes a day. Your headaches could be a side effect from a number of things. Maybe your brain is crying out for fuel or maybe even your neurons are slowly dying! 
Good luck.
